I couter-argued and unknowingly hurt her emotionally, I felt very  
sad about this.

I felt sad at having to leave my girlfriend after constant problems  
and failed attempts at reconciliation.  My sadness was caused by  
the irreversibility of the decision.

I started a new branch of studies after having failed a former  
one.  When I got back my exam papers I was very happy to know  
that I almost had full marks.

The thought that I'll never sit at the school desk again, caused  
a deep grief at the end of my eleventh form.

When my uncle gave me my first year's results.  I opened the  
envelope and my eyes ran into two "B+" - in EC110 and M160, this  
meant that I had qualified for a major in economics.

When a friend of mine keeps telling me morbid things that  
happened to his dog.

One of these people who sell meat in town used a knife to stab  
his friend and later carried on using the same knife to cut meat.

When it appeared that I was not pregnant when I was several weeks  
overtime.

I felt guilty when I spent a night at my boyfriend's place,  
particularly because I had been harsh and spiteful when I had  
left home.  The reason was that I feared a possible discussion on  
the subject and I wanted to leave defiantly.
After receiving the grade on the paper mentioned in FEAR.

When I told my sister I had slept with my boyfriend, and she at  
first was mad at me I then felt shame for this act, but not  
guilt.

Winning a tight tennis match. One set to play, and the team was  
behind by 3 games. We won the last set 6-2 and won the match by a  
game.
When I got the scholarship letter from Australia.

When an employer of my younger sister (17 yrs) made a "pass" at  
her.

Two years ago my best friend died in an accident, just a day  
before my birthray.  We were very close to each other and I felt  
very sad at loosing a close friend.
Often a dog which is treated very badly by his owner comes to us.
I was very happy when I got an attractive Summer job.

I dreamt of my father's death while I was at secondary school.  I  
was screaming at the top of my voice and was woken up by my  
friend.  That day I was really sad.
Relative's death.

When my grandfather was sick, and died I felt more sad, though,  
when he was sick.
Saw a beggar on the street (China still so poor).
I couldn't be with a girl on whom I was very keen.
Finding out that I am not ill (not seriously).

I came across a woman in town who was very drunk.  She was  
swearing at everyone and carried on drinking even though she  
could hardly stand.

When my friends tried to discriminate against my friendship with  
certain other friends which they thought was improper.
When my love for a guy was returned.

I was moving in the graveyard at 6.00 pm one day and was griped  
by fear because I was told that ghosts detain people moving there  
at night.

When I was walking on the street, I slipped on the dung of a dog.  
I did not fall down, but I felt disgusted by the bad smell on my  
sole.

When I realized the burden it was for my mother to look after all  
of us, all by herself.

A person I know who tells lies and so pretending to be better  
than she is.

I was not given a chance to explain to my close relatives as to  
why I could not go to visit them when they were ill.  When I did  
go, they thought that I had been selfish and irresponsible during 
their illness.

When  first came to CAL I went to a rally on Sproul and I later  
learned that the rally was conducted by the Moonie cult. They  
were taking pictures at the rally, so I was afraid that they  
would circulate the pictures and then kidnap people. I did not  
know how the cult worked. I was scared.

My friend came to the concert for my sake as it was me who had  
organized it and the concert was unsuccessful.

One of my friends came to know through some other friends that I    
had applied for some course in an institute.  He asked me "why  
did not you tell me, I would also have applied."  At that I felt  
guilty.

I was disappointed and angry at the bad quality of a documentay  
program on TV.  In my opinion, the topic was important and the  
program should have been made with seriousness and consideration.

I stormed into the room, hoping to cool myself with some soft  
music from my three band radio cassette.  There was only young  
Kaley there and he explained, " Your aunt has sold it as she  
wanted to buy clothes."

When I met a friend whom I had not seen for a long time and  
heard all about her troubles, I thought that I should have got  
in touch with her earlier.

I feel it when I see that somebody is traying to made a stupid of  
me.

I had misbehaved at a party and did not wish to meet the person  
in question later.

When as a child I stole, from a friend of mine, the ring she had  
got in an easter egg.

First weekend back home after one week at Uni I scolded one of my  
sister's best friends for using our telephone. Very silly, but I  
was annoyed because she was there at a time when I needed to be  
with my family.
I lied to one of my best friends.

My mother, sister and I were thinking about old times, our  
childhood, and we had a very happy time.
Watching China winning the Asian Olympic games.
When grandfather died.

I studied medicine for several semesters. I was always disgusted  
when we had the dissecting-course. I cannot understand why some  
persons like this course.

We were walking in the park at night.  It was very dark and very  
late.  We began to hear foot steps all around us, and we could  
not find our way out.

At a party in which I met an interesting female. We enjoyed  
eachothers company, while slow dacing.
When an earlier friend was spreading negative rumours about me.

My mother caught me stealing some food when I was a young  
boy.
When I passed the university entrance exam.
When I failed the grade seven examination.

When I was refused a transfer from my school to another, simply  
because it was far away from my house.

When my boyfriend wouldn't dance with me on my graduation night  
because he thought I could dance with my friends who were  
friendly.

I visited a special education school. The headmaster applied a  
policy of strict positive - negative reinforcement to the  
children involved. Children who measured up to his standards were  
made a fuss of - children who didn't were ignored.
When my father shouted at me for going to a party with my sister.

I received a grade above average on a midterm (chemistry) and I  
expected onevery below average.

When I didn't bring my girlfriend home one night. Later she told  
me that a cardriver solicited her.
[ When I acted against my mind or conscious.]
When I was left by the person I loved without any reason.

I received an unexpected B+ on an engineering midterm. I did not  
study nearly as much as I should have and it was a difficult  
test.

When I did something naughty and it lead to the embarrassment of  
my parents.
When going to the exam.
A friend asked for help and I was not able to help.

One night, my boyfriend expressed his love for me in the canteen in  
the presence of my friends by giving me a present.

I was walking along the passage to my room (very near the anatomy  
laboratory) and I heard something and felt that there was some  
thing behind me.  I looked back and there was no one.  I started  
imagining that maybe it was a corpse.
When my girlfriend decided to finish our relation.

My mother was unwell and went for many cancer tests. She spent  
time in hospital being opened and closed many times.
Saying goodbye to a friend.

When my tennis match was interrupted because a kid cycled right  
into the court.
When my aunt passed away in early 1982.

I was seriously injured in a road accident. The very first steps  
I took with only one crutch to support me I felt so good. I enjoy  
being alive.

I slept in a tent at the Barracks which caught fire at night and  
my best possessions got burnt in there.

Some days ago I had a car accident. It was quite slight but  
through my fault. I felt strong shame because I had the spirits  
of a good driver.
When I beat up my son for having beaten up his sister.

A couple of years ago during the summer holiday, I was fishing at  
a lake with my husband.  Suddenly it started raining while the  
sun was still shining. I experienced a feeling of joy, happiness  
and fulfillment.  the whole nature was full of music.
Insulted by classmate in public.
Day time robbery of our house.

When I thought that it was going to be impossible for me to start  
studying (due to wrong information from the student advisor).

Years ago, on my way to school by the forest path I came across  
an exhibitionist.
I angered a close friend and he was injured.
When a thunder belt hit the roof top of the building I was in.

When people without my permission pry in my belongings and take  
things out of it.

Our class had organized a picnic in November.  I was the class  
representative so I became the organizor.  However the picnic  
was postponed by one week and I had something else to do then.  
Initially I did not ponder on what to do and decided to go for  
the picnic.  When I had the time to think about it I thought that  
my decision was wrong.  My classmates thought that I would go as  
I had signed my name but I did not go.  I told another class  
representative that I was not going but he did not know the  
reason behind my not going.  After the picnic my classmates asked  
me why I had not gone to the picnic and everytime someone  
mentioned it I was apologetic.  I should have decided right in  
the begining that I would not go and then they would not see me  
as irresponsible i.e promising to go and changing my mind  
afterwards.

When I saw a T.V programme on animals in the film world  
(mistreated and used).

During the military service, I lost a part of an equipment; I  
accused another person and he was rebuked and punished.

I was in the house at night and I heard a hyena crying outside.  
It cried for almost an hour and I feared it might break the  
window and enter inside the house.
When I was jumped by three men in a deserted area.

I guess I have often been ashamed after having talked badly of  
other people.

During an informal talk with a friend when we talk about the life  
of another person, a common friend, that is in a situation of not  
being able to assume certain problems that he decided to solve,  
that is, she herself suggested the problems and decided to solve  
them but didn't get it until the moment.

I went to a doctor with a complaint. The doctor told me that I  
was completely healthy.

My father began to say incoherant things concerning my brother's and  
my own behaviour towards him.  His biased (authoritarian) and  
ridiculous point of view made us angry.

A young girl tried to put an end to her life because of lover's  
grief; not until she was in hospital I heard that I had been the  
reason for her action.
When going out I am threatened regularly by two punk-girls.
When I won a tennis match.
Finding out that I made a stupid mistake in the examn.
When I failed the  grade 7 exams.
I had an accident with damage to the car body.

When I got fired from a job because I gave a discount to a  
friend.

One day I was really angry when all my food was eaten by a dog.  
My anger was against my mother because she was careless. She  
didn't keep the food in a hidden and proper place.

My brother had bowel obstruction, having heard that he was going  
for surgery, I was afraid he might not come back to life after  
hearing of the General Anaesthesia.

The fact that I hadn't been informed about something and I had the  
greatest trust in this person.

I felt disgust with alcohol in general when a close friend of  
mine got so drunk that he didn't realize what he was doing and it  
was quite shameful.
Got ill.

When I was teaching a student started making silly remarks in  
class.

I had to call somebody between 12 and 12:30. As I had no  
possibility to call him at this time, I did not do it until 3  
p.m.

Recently when my sister, who is four years younger than me and  
very spoiled, shouted at my mother for no apparent reason .  The  
heart-broken expression on my mother's face made me feel very  
angry.

When my library books were overdue and I did not have the money  
to pay for them.

When my father (physically handicapped) asks me to do something  
and I raise several objections. Often I can fix it in few  
moments.
When I was told that I had passed the exams.

When a friend carelessly broke and object in my parent's house  
and did not apologize, or pay, or anything.

When I flew out to my mother and made rude remarks because I felt  
so tense (studied too hard for an examination).

When I come home in the evening, the first thing I do is to sit  
down and smoke a cigarette. One day I found the flat in a totally  
desolate state. My girl-friend had wanted to tidy up but had not  
finished.

When my friend needed my help very much and I, at that moment, made  
an end to our relationship.

When the grandmother of my friend died in a hospital. My friend  
was crying and I was sad, too.

During a dance someone slashed my tires and dumped paint on my  
car. I had four other friends with me that I drove and  
furthermore it was raining.

I was away to school (Primary). In my abscence my young brother  
at home got sick suddenly. My parents took him to hospital. On  
the way he died. It came to me as a sad, sudden and shocking  
news and I felt very sad.

When diving deep into the sea to reach the floor I felt  
breathless. I was cautious but I doubted I should be able to come  
to the surface and inhale.

When a friend of mine discussed with me, I felt fear of losing  
her. This occurred because we had a missunderstanding between  
mutual colleagues.
When I entered University.
The lift of Stockholm central station stank of vomit and urine.

I was really pissed when the Russians boycotted the '84 Olympics.  
I had anger towards them and Jimmy Crter. I was very anxious to  
see it.

Once I went home totally drunk and roused all our neighbours from  
sleep.

I felt sad when a friend of mine died and I felt that something  
had irrevocably gone away from me.

My mother died of cancer after a 4 year illness - I think the  
most pregnant moment of sadness was the next morning, just as the  
sun rose.

When you are satisfied with something, when you achieve something  
you have striven to.

I felt that I contributed to a possible rift in the relationship  
between a boy and girl soon to be married, in my flat after I  
moved in. After stating my celibacy to him which she overheard  
and didn't previously know about I suspect.

A man tried to have sexual intercourse with me, though I had  
communicated my unwillingness.  Later on, I felt disgust at that  
person as well as myself because I had partly submitted.

I was angry about several drivers who showed an aggressive and  
dangerous driving habit.
Finding out that life span in China is shorter than in the West.

Tonight in bed when I realised how bad my relationship with my  
friend was.
When a class-mate died.

I was nailed. I lied in connection with a book which I took from  
the library, because I had to keep it for a longer time.

I was inside the car with my husband and we were assaulted with a  
gun at 10 o'clock in the evening.

A nightmare.  I was dreaming about bloodsuckers, which I tried to  
shake off from my body, they are everywhere, they get glued, they  
suck.  And there are a lot of them.  I panic.

The first time I saw a pornographic film, all that in practice is  
so beautiful but on the screen appered as something mechanical,  
irrational, disgusting and dehumanizing.
Taking a chemistry midterm.
When my brother died.

It was on St. Claus Day when I was five years old. St. Claus and  
his Devil Servant came to see me. St. Claus' Devil Servant  
rattled with his chain and bowled terribly. I was so frightened  
that my parents had to ask him to leave.
You told me psychology can help people to be happier.

I was once called in court in Zemba Traditional court to answer a  
charge of impregnanting a young lady, I felt guilty for she had  
some letters which I used to write her as an exhibit in court.

After a terrible quarrel with my family, I withdrew in my room. I  
felt guilty because I had caused this scene by my aggressive  
behavior.

A friend of mine came to visit and stayed with my roommate and me.  
My roommate and she became good friends. After she left, he  
didn't talk too highly of her.
When I passed the TOEFEL with very good marks.

I got a very nasty electrical shock when I was tampering with  
some electrical applainces.

My third grade teacher caught me cheating on a spelling test. I  
couldn't spell Australia and she said in a loud voice something  
like "We don't have cheaters in my class".

With a Manager who insists on making crude innuendos pertaining  
to sex.

My girl-friend did not understand me; I was angry with myself  
because I had problems when we seperated - I could not resign  
myself to it.
I choked on a cold drink in front of girls who were strangers.
NO RESPONSE.

My mother told my uncle who is a Roman Catholic Priest  
(Redemptist Father) that I had been living in a de-facto  
relationship for three years. He was very, very angry at me.

While playing a ball game, I was just about to make a goal when I  
was thrown off my feet, and I failed to score the goal.
When I was the South Koreans on the TV.

Every time, in the last few days, when my girlfriend told me that  
she loves me.
When I overate at lunch.
Vertigo - standing on a ladder and painting the house.
Blank.
It happens to me quite often. I can't describe a particular case.

I found myself involved in a fight in which a person died and I  
had to intervene with some risk.

I was sad at the expulsion of some of my comrades during the UNZA  
demonstrations.

When I have suffered a terrible fit of eating, that frequently  
occurs. Then I eat everything, I act like a glutton I eat big  
amounts of food, sometimes even half a loaf.

When I dived among sharks and the brightly coloured fish on the  
outer reef of Tvavni, Fidgi.

At a cash desk where I had gone to buy 16 rolls of kitchen paper  
at a reduced price.  After queuing with screaming children; it  
turned out that I had taken two 8 roll packets instead of the one  
16 roll packet to which the rebate applied.  The assistant said  
"You will have to get it another time."

I went for a walk on the beach with a friend whom I had not seen  
for many months.  The weather was very pleasant, we had some  
ice-cream and lots of fun on the beach.

When I was told a friend's baby had been born with only partial  
sight. This was her first child and she was not young (the mother  
that is).

I remember about an unpleasant event in relation to my mother. I  
felt guilty before her.

I had met someone and we became good friends. Our relationship  
grew closer and now he is my boyfriend. I felt joy when I found  
out how he felt about me.
Failed in a piblic argument.

Having my personal objects rearranged by someone else without my  
consent and having it arranged to their taste. Then trying to  
find a particular object they rearranged for an hour or more.

When I was a child I used to play with my cousin gushing wather  
to each other in front of the door of my house. One day we  
decided to gush with on a passing car. The driver stopped and  
went to discuss with my mother and my aunt that were there.
When I got 1 mark in an Abnormal Psychology exam.
When I was accused of "bitching" about best friend.

I get irritated with my son when he screams or is sick all over  
his clean clothes.

I had a dream about my fiancTe leaving me and making an end to  
our relation.

When I was teased by my friend for not scoring good marks in the  
exams.

When I received the best actor award at the inter-college drama  
competition.  It gave me tremendous joy and satisfaction which  
lasted for several days.

When I realized that not all my friends like the comments that I  
pass in their presence.
I felt sad when my father was sick.

When I was walking down the street, some boys showed me a knife  
and stole all my money.

When I decided to leave my steady, secure employment to come to  
university. Because I didn't know if I could cope with all the  
requirements of study and also being older I didn't know if I  
would enjoy mixing with younger people, also financial  
insecurity.
When my child was born.

After a long trip in my dad's van without incident I stopped to  
fill the tank with gas and dented the side of the van against the  
pole. Then my cars electrical system would not work when I tried  
to drive home from his house.
After the death of a girl who I disliked.

Brother continually interupting while I was talking on the  
telephone.

I had a short lasting sexual relationship with someone I didn't  
love.

A close relative was at odds with a very powerful firm.  All his  
things had been taken, His dad had died a little before this  
event.  He gathhered his children and vowed to give them a good  
life with a new start - the words were hollow, he bit back his  
tears .....I asked to be excused and then went and cried in the  
loo.
Guy I cared for went back to Canada to live.

I felt shame when I didn't study enough for my exams and as a  
result I failed. I then invented idle stories to talk it good for  
myself and the others.

When I was young I felt guilty because I thought that I had  
commited a grave sin.

Last night I did not do very well in one of the subjects.  Before  
the result was announced I feared that I would fail.  Finally I  
got a D and as the results of the other subjects were not all       
good I felt a little sad.
When a friend of mine was trying to make a fool out of me.

My examination results were not satisfactory even though I had  
tried my best.  Then I started wondering about my abilities for  
the major subject.  However I did not know how to choose my major  
subject if I were to change it.

I went to a friend's baptism as she became a Christian after me  
and I realized that she was more enthusiastic about her spiritual  
life than I was.  When I was with my brothers and sisters of  
Christ I had a guilty feeling which could not be dismissed  
easily.  When pepole asked me as to when I would be baptised my  
guilt feeling deepened.

Making an unexpected talk with a professor in the canteen. This  
made me shy.

When I learnt that the girl I had impregnated was in hospital and  
was on the verge of dying as she had refused to accept the  
responsibility of her pregnancy and had wanted to commit suicide.

Exaggerating certain circumstances, wrong attitude and evaluation  
of these circumstances.

When somebody suddenly said something (about me) at a wrong  
moment and I didn't agree (at that exact moment I was needing an  
extremely positive word).
Boyfriend "chatting up" another girl.
Close friends talking badly of other friends.

I discovered some pornographic literature in a workmates drawers.  
The literature featured pictures of naked women defecating on one  
another.

I found a human "treasure" that I desired and got immediately. I  
didn't think about anything. When I touched him I imploded but I  
am whole.

I wanted to be pregnant and did not succeed, so I was depressed     
at every menstruation.
Before an examn.

Having to decide on a termination of a pregnancy, after  
discussing it with friends, family and the man involved.

My father stayed abroad for one year. He does not like to write  
letters because he makes ortographic mistakes. I never had a good  
relation to him. He wrote me a letter in which he said that he  
loved me.

When I was an auxiliary nurse at the hospital and I had to change  
the nappies, for the first time, of a very old and sick woman.

When we stayed in Vienna with our class, my friend and I behaved  
incorrectly. Our teacher threatened us with exclusion from  
school.

I let my pet budgie loose to fly around my room one afternoon. A  
few hours afterwards I found he was still free, went in and out  
of my room leaving the door open. My cat got in and killed my  
budgie - this happened to 3 budgies.

I was very sad when I heard about the death of my teacher who  
taught me in Standard 8.
I was hunting, and was lost in the fog in the mountains.

I got angry at my mother for something trivial.  We were in a  
bad mood because my father was very ill and I knew that my mother  
really needed support.  I had reacted wrongly.

When the result of a project work was treated nonchalantly  
intead of being criticized by the teacher.

My boy-friend told me that he would take me to the training of  
the life-saving dogs.

At a carneval-party I smooched with a man - some days later I was  
rather ashamed for that.

In a confrontation with a person, he provoked me several times  
till I reacted in an angry way.  Fortunately there were no  
disastrous consequences.

Physically fighting with my girlfriend because she just walked  
out of a room of my friends and had pushed and cursed at me when  
I went to find her.

When I was a child I was playing on the upper deck of the bed  
with my brother.  My parents slept on the lower deck.  My father  
felt disgusted and beat me up.  I felt very sad as my father had  
never beaten me or scolded me before.
Did not pick up a water mellon skin, someone slipped on it.
A dark night when I had to go to the outdoor lavatory.

When I am with friends and I do what pleases me this often  
happenes.

In certain occasion I have a fight with my boyfriend. During the  
fight I closed the door at his face. He went away but came back  
next day.

During my high school time I succeeded to play a concert of  
Mozart on the piano when I gave my first performance I succeeded  
to play it very well.

At a party I saw two persons having a fight. The aggressions and  
the hate between these persons produced an unpleasant impression  
on me.

A very close friend of mine invited me to spend the holidays with  
him.  He was very kind, good and understanding.  However it  
turned out that he had two of his cousins at his place.  He,  
however gave me everything I needed - even transport money.

I entrusted a friend with the delivery of some money to my  
father, however he misused the money.

Skiing down a very icy slope, very fast in white-out conditions.  
Out of control with no idea of what I was doing or where I was  
heading.

I spent a weekend in San Diego visiting my boyfriend Rob. We were  
at the airport and my plane was just about so leave. After saying  
goodbye, I boarded the plane. It was the hardest thing to do and  
it was a sad trip home.
When I thought the house was on fire at night.

Eating the last remains of dinner that someone else (unknown to  
me) had claimed.

When I was young I stole something from a shop and got caught,  
then I was taken to the police station and my parents had to come  
and get me.

I acted in an English play in college and got the Best Actress  
award, while our play got the first place.
When I had a Latin examination in school.
When I saw a car run over a child, out of carelessness.

I was happy to hear that my sister had won a prize at running  
competition.

A friend of mine who was driving a car ahead of me died in a  
car accident.

When I took the first year university exams and made a lot of  
mistakes in the P110 exam.  I was afraid of failing and thus  
being unable to go to the school of medicine.

I was driving near my girlfriend's house and I decided to keep  
going because it was late and I would be back in the next few  
days anyway. The next day she was killed in a road accident.
Afraid of getting alone without friends, without anybody.
When I saw our computer teacher.

When I was watching a movie with many violent episodes.  They  
accurately showed the cutting of corpses, etc...

I had a class-mate who was rather stupid.  I did not like him  
but I respected him.  When he tried to talk to someone, they  
would not listen to him and I could not bear seeing this.
Hearing of a filthy situation over the phone.

I was looking after a dying patient at work one night, a young  
woman, my colleague was talking to her relatives and .... to  
offer them any support emotionally, physically and then sent them  
down to the coffee shop to have a dinner rather than offering the  
facilities available for their use cause it involved her having  
to do some work. Seeing them again I felt disgusted at her  
attitude.

When my brother ran away from home and I thought it was because  
of my continously scolding him.

It was spring and the ice was melting.  I was far out on a jetty and I poked the ice with a long branch to try and break it.
 The branch went through the ice and I fell in, the water closed  
in over my head.
[ When I am, in my opinion, not understood correctly. ]

I insulted my friend for a small reason and after time I realised  
that I was wrong and felt ashamed; everytime I meet her I feel  
ashamed.
In summer when I was sailing with friends in Greece I felt joy.

I felt it when playing I pushed my brother and he fell down  
cutting himself in pieces of tile.
The smell of garlic in rush-hour bus.
Watching Muldoon act as my P.M.
I was angry this morning when I missed the train to university.

My grandmother died, and my mother called me one sunday morning  
in the Autumn.  The way my mother told me about it, I hated her  
at that moment.  She sounded as if she had been waiting for the  
death of my grandmother.  I had lost a person close to me.  I  
felt guilty too as I had been bad to my grandmother of late.  I had not  
remained calm when she no longer understood everything so well.
Treatment to become pregnant with a negative result.
Ctiticized by teachers in public.
A case of unrequited love.

When I stayed in the house of friends, I washed my face and  
wanted to dry it with a towel. This towel seemed to have been  
used over a long time already. It smelled indefinably awful.

I put my head into the pullover of a girl to see her breasts. The  
girl looked at me so that I felt ashamed.

Moving to an unknown place, away from the familiar surroundings  
and into a situation of loneliness.

A class-mate died after being two months in coma, after a car  
accident.

My parents scolded me a lot for something I had not done.  It was  
my sister who had done it.

When I was studying in the library a pair of lovers were sitting  
next to me talking in an intense and soft voice.  They were  
disturbing others.
When I was treated improperly by someone.
[ No description.]

This was when I saw, for the first time, a naked woman  
(prostitute) run away from a house after having been discovered  
by the guardian.
When my mother was operated.

I felt joy when I red my name in the list of the approved in the  
entrance college examination.

When for the first time I rode on a motorcycle with my brother.   
He was going so fast that I felt that I would fall off without my  
brother realizing it.

Leaving Melbourne to move interstate - leaving relatives and  
friends behind.
When my B.A results had not come.

I wanted to go to a friend of mine who had a party; at the moment  
I wanted to leave, my father said I couldn't go because he needed  
me for some work in the afternoon.

I bumped my dad's car in a lamp post.  He was not at home then,  
neither was he home when I left for the campus.  I did not tell  
him about the accident and I will never tell him.

At boarding school someone put a lot of tiny thorns on my bed.   
When I complained everybody began teasing me and laughing at my  
inability to find out my enemies.  I lost my temper.

When I saw a good friend again after not having seen her for a  
long time.

During class one day I walked out of the class.  The  
teacher noticed it and decided that he would take some action  
against me, when I realized this I approached him and told him  
that I was sorry for the incident and would not repeat it.

I rejected a person whom I had always thought to be a friend.  I  
told him so and he reacted angrily.  I felt guilty at not having  
realized it before and at having hurt him.

After the accident which I described in SHAME. I came to myself  
and saw how terrible everything looked like. I disgusted myself  
and everything I saw.
First anatomy lesson.

An argument among friends in which my opinions on the way to  
spend spare time were disapproved.

When, after a week at school, a teacher sent a note home saying  
that my son was inattentive and unable to do his lessons.

To have a friend who I didn't see for months, and under the  
circumstances that I met him made me feel happy, and perhaps  
because it has been one of the good things that I learned with  
this friend.

I lead a rather secure life.  The only thing I can remember is a  
song from the nineteenth century which is against alcohol.  Both  
the melody and the word (although naive) effected my emotions.

My classmate got a "B" for his homework while I only got a "C".   
When we got the results he acted as if he did not merit this  
grade.  I found that his humility was hypocritical and I found it  
disgusting.
Because of the examination I had to study night and day.

Once while playing tennis with my classmate I lost a few tennis  
balls.  I found one near the tennis court and took it to be mine  
despite thinking that it might belong to the student in the next  
court.  I felt guilty.  Later someone came to me to claim the  
ball and I gave it back to him.
When I got 1/2 out of 15 in Abnormal Psychology I felt ashamed.
I locked myself out.

I had been telling lies and people discovered instantly that I  
was telling lies. I felt very shameful and I felt like  
disappearing from people.
When my special friend said "I love you" for the first time.
When I got very drunk and really misbehaved at Christmas.

There is a person whom I disgust. Evrey time I see her I get this  
terrible feeling I disgust her whole appearance.

When, for example, I left for the first time my parents and I  
went to live in Sofia.
I won a sport contest.

On New Year's Eve I went in a disco with friends. I amused myself  
and got to know many other people.

It happens sometimes in connection with certain persons with whom  
I have frequent relationships but nothing special.

My little cat which I had raised all by myself, hanged itself when  
playing in the garden.

Yesterday while playing volley ball, there was one person extra     
and somebody had to out.  A mess worker and I were the   
last ones to arrive and we had arrived at the same time.   
Rightfully one of us had to opt out of the game, as I was  
delaying leaving the mess worker opted out saying that I should  
play.  I felt ashamed of myself.

When my mother looked in my drawer (where I keep my personal  
things) and she found some porno photos that I have kept from  
more than a week, and split it.

When I dream of anything terrifying I used to have fear for the  
rest of the day that the dream might come true e.g., being beaten  
(or eaten ?) by a snake.

When I came to know that my father and his parents were : self  
interested, dirty, negative, egoist, bad peolpe,......

When I was informed that I had been accepted as a student of  
Psychology.

We were driving on a very dusty road at night and the driver  
tried to overtake a very big truck only to find another big truck  
parked right in front.
I unexpectedly got a present from my father.

You may find out that I am stupid and not to let me do your  
experiment.

Being sexually assaulted (not rape, but passionate kissing) by a  
friend's father - he stopped when he was driving me home. I  
hadn't wanted the lift, had refused 3 times, and then felt it'd  
be rude to refuse again. Was really afraid of what he might do.
When I noticed the negative changes in a friend's behaviour.

I went to a fair where a guy who was drunk kept bothering me and  
in the end I got really angry.
My parents failed to visit me as they promised.
Someone borrowed my textbook and deliberately did not return it.
When as an 8 year old, I wet myself in school.
Not collecting homeworks in time to give the teacher.

My girlfriend does practice and therefore leaves me alone at  
night and in the weekend. In addition, she is very busy doing  
several things. So we don't see each other often.
When I see the acts and deeds of a blind drunk man.

I was sad when I heard that my cousin died because of being  
bewitched by her husband's second wife.

When I was a child, I had a nightmare. At that time, I was not  
yet able to tell anybody about it, so I was very frightened. I  
could not explain myself all that and I had to deal with it by  
myself.

I felt guilt to have come back from home without seeing my father.  
When I went home he was at work.

A friend of mine called me when I was not at home.  I phoned her  
back to know what she wanted and she told me that she had dialled  
the wrong number.

My father and I had an argument because I do not help enough at  
home.

When I realized that I was directing the feelings of discontent  
with myself at my partner and this way was trying to put the blame  
on him instead of sorting out my own feeliings.

Telling a lie to wife over phone about what I had been working  
at.

When, to my surprise, I got to know about having got "very good"  
high school graduation marks.

In an express bus I sat on a seat meant for senior citizens and  
invalids.

When I saw that the mark I had obtained in an exam was a good  
one.

When playing a football match, there was one player who made mean  
tackels, kicked at everything and did things having nothing to do  
with football.

When being made look a fool by the teacher in front of the class  
during a turn.
When my dad passed away.
When my car suddenly broke down !
[ I have not felt this emotion yet.]
When opened a box of biscuits and found worms inside.

I had been having a heated argument with a lover - whose  
intention was that we should marry in the near future - and was  
rejected by her when I started to cry. When I stopped crying for  
a moment she said "There, have you got it all out now ?".

When going out in the weekend I have to bike 5 kilometers through  
lonely and dark polders, then I always have terrifying fantasies.

When I dined with my new friends, one of them kept reminding us  
that he was superior.

I was sleeping when I heard the neighbours screaming, I peeped  
through the window and saw a thief  trying to enter my  
neighbour's house.

I felt angry when I failed in an exam about which I knew quite a  
few things and I did not deserve to be plucked.

I caught a "peeping tom" at my window when I was getting  
undressed.
I was alone at home on New Year's Eve.

I had an appointment with a colleague of mine to give her my  
lecture notes. I couldn't go and I didn't send them, and so the  
girl missed a day for the preparation of her term exams.
Having told a certain lie.

The day the Real Madrid team of basket ball qualified for the  
final at Athens.

I sensed such a feeling when I understood I was admitted to the  
University. I was at home, the atmosphere was still, though I  
myself was full of suspense. I tried to do different things. When  
the telephone rang and...! Yes, of course there were other  
situations when I felt a similar feeling but I was unmindful of  
them.
Not getting the class paper in time for the lecture.
Receiving a letter from a boy I care.
On my birthday, when I was given my presents.
Thinking about other things in a lecture.
I felt joy when my boyfriend proposed to me in marriage.

An invitation to spend 5 days at the seaside with all expenses  
paid.

To go through the underground way at suburb station of LAPA. Poor  
people and the ambulants badly dressed up in a passage badly  
kept.

When I went to the library three weeks after it had opened and  
found that everyone was busy.
Walking alone in the dark in a strange street.

When I was a child, one day while playing, I fell up to my waist  
in mud.

We are several friends but our characters are very different and  
we inevitably split in the two extremes. It is sad that I myself  
don't know what to do, I try not to hurt either of the "parties"  
because there are conflicts to which one I should belong.

At an anti-pornography meeting, when samples from films and  
magazines were shown.

I went to go get a bike innertube fixed. I fixed it and I was  
supposed to pay previously but I didn't. I said I would after I  
fixed the tire. After fixing the tire, the salesperson who helped  
me was gone so I walked out of the store without paying. I felt  
guilty so I went inside and paid for the tire.

After a party I spent the night with a friend. We both were  
drunk, the morning was disillusioning. A friend was me leaving  
the room and I felt shabby and immoral.

While he was drunk, my life partner tried to hit me.  I felt  
scared and fled to the bathroom.

I was given an exam which I thought did not measure at all my  
ability or my knowledge of the subject.
The death of my grandfather.

When I was a child: I had told my mother a lie and she found it  
out.
That I didn't take the time to make an appointment with someone.
Death of my father

When I got a message that I was employed as a nurse at a  
kindergarten.

After taking a difficult midterm for one of my classes, I felt  
shame for not studying as much as I should have. I was ashamed of  
the results of the midterm.

When I was afraid to tell my sports teacher at secondary school  
that I had not participated in the sports activities the previous  
day.
Class leader told me to collect homework for him.
My roommate's lack of consideration of me.

I watched a football match with my old friend.  The performance  
of the team was very good and the team members were full of  
spirit.  The match was excellent and every time a goal was scored  
I felt excited.

A close acquaintance of the family died of lung cancer.   
Although it was expected, I still felt depressed.

When my first boyfriend left me. I tried not to let him  
understand I felt miserable.

Afraid I wouldn't catch the train when I was going to see my  
sweetheart.

I hit my cousin badly after she threw away my dresses in a  
pit-latrine that the little girl fainted.

When I took my entrance exams successfully and also when I got my  
school leaving certificate because the delivering ceremony was  
extremely official.

When I was young my mother told the neighbour that I had wet the  
bed.  I felt ashamed thinking that the neighbour's children would  
get to know about it.

When I was 7-8 years old, I woke up one night and found myself  
alone at home.  My mother had gone out to buy cigarattes from a  
machine.

I was really hoping that I would pass the examination, but I  
failed and so I felt very sad.

When my girl went away for a holiday without saying good-bye to  
me.

When I was still a child I was told off in face of other persons  
for having touched an object that didn't belong to me.

When I was 17, I had a mystic vision. I melted into a dazzling  
light, which omitted perfect love. The physical experience became  
unimportant, I heard or saw the words "overcome egotism". The  
feeling of joy remained for month after that experience.

I had left a student newspaper of the Chinese university on the  
table of the library.  It had disappeared when I came back.

I was walking in the wood at night with my boyfriend. Very  
romantic. Suddenly I heard a car driving very slowly with the  
lights out, it looked as if they were looking for something.

The news of the natural calamity, an earthquake in which hundreds   
of Mexican people died.

An incident occurred to me when I was going home with my  
girlfriend. On the way, a man named Banda grabbed my girlfriend  
in my presence. I was really angry with him and as a result I  
threw stones at him and he ran away.

When criticizing something about a person and then realizing that  
the person whom one is talking to is similar.
Never really had the experience just yet - N/A.
When I had to leave home to go to some other place to study.

One evening a friend of mine was telling a fearful story, nobody  
took it seriously but I got frightened.

When I miss the train and I am late, and I have to wait half an  
hour for the next one.

When my brother promised me money but he failed to fulfill the  
promise.
When I made an end on a relationship after three years.
Almost had a bicycle accident.

I experienced shame when I failed to keep a promise to meet my  
friend at the bus depot. He later came and asked me why I had not  
turned up.
I drink wine too often.

I do not like one of our neighbours as they are very selfish.   
Whenever they want something or need help they come to see us,   
otherwise they do not even bother about people who live next to  
them.
When someone I know was caught in an "adultery" situation.

A relative of mine had come to see my husband to talk to him  
about a problem concerning his sister and me.  I was angry  
because this relative of mine did not dare to speak to me and  
instead spoke to my husband.  I got to know about it later the  
same day.

In primary school I once faltered while answering a question and  
the others started laughing.

I am chosen for the English lectures instead of my good friend  
and people told me that girls are more likely to be chosen.
Saw people spitting in public.

When my brother had to spend all evening repairing a gear-lever  
that I had broken.
When programmes on violence or pornography are shown on T.V.

My first day to work in hospital, when I was dressing wounds I  
was disgusted when I came across one wound with a very bad smell.
A party I went to last Christmas.

When we received  our academic result I learnt that my  results  
were bad as I had not done my best.  The results of my  
accquaintances were good and when they asked me about my results  
I really did not want to answer.

I reached the bus stop and realized that I had forgotten my bus  
pass.

When I came to know that my grandmother had died.  She was very  
close to me.

When I was little I lost control of my bike and started to go  
into a buay intersection but my neighbor stopped me just in time.

When I received a positive answer from my appeal to withdraw my  
registration at UNZA.

My younger brother and sister were involved in an accident on  
their way back from school and my brother was quite badly hurt.

While having a discussion with a colleague of mine, I realized that her  
conception of man and work were similar to mine.

I went home all alone from a restaurant. It was dark, I went very  
fast. Behind me, there were some drunk men who shouted at me. By  
chance, I met some friends who accompanied me.

Alone in the house (late 8pm) I heard noises. Sounded like someone  
was trying to get in our back door.
Saw a mate bribing the leader.

[ I feel disgust at people lying.  It means that they say one  
thing to one person and the same thing in another way to another  
person and this makes people quarrel among themselves.]

I was sleeping alone in the house at night. A boy putting on a  
short only knocked at the window whispering that I should open  
for him.

I felt disgusted when we (family) avoided a problem which could  
be solved readily.

I felt very sad when I had to give up something that by right was  
mine and although I didn't get it, a kind of suvenir that people  
don't give you the right to have.

As I was not paying attention, my little brother fell off the  
table.

I was swimming in the sea and a wave took the top part of my  
bikini away.

When my dog died.  I had reared it for nearly three years.  It  
had been ill for several days and had not eaten anything.  One  
morning I found it dead.

When I got a first class in the twelveth standard exams, I was very  
surprised and happy and I had a very good time with my friends.

It was the time when everybody spoke about and discussed  
Hainburg. I was also asked for my opinion. I was ashamed because  
I had no firm view of the whole thing and therefor was not able  
to join the conversation.

Waiting for the results of the High level examination.  I was  
afraid of not being accepted.
When I damaged my wristwatch which I liked very much.

When I was admitted to a Language school. On the day when I was  
informed by a message and my parents congratulated me.

The weather is very bad (fog and slipperiness) the newcast  
reports many traffic accidents and my boyfriend is driving home  
and still has 60 kilometers to go.

My cousins were playing at home and one of them broke a decorative  
object which was very precious to me.

When a close friend of mine who was with me in first year could  
not make it to the second year.

I am happpy when I get good results in the field of academics or  
athletics.
I was forced to leave an unforgettable friend.
Attitude to a related family.

I wanted to get rid of a bad habit and it seemed that I had  
succeeded.  However a year later I got the bad habit again.  I felt   
useless as I always found excuses to explain my behaviour.  As a result I  
felt guilty.

While intoxicated I damaged my sister's car in a minor way and  
someone elses in a minor way.

When I noticed that my parents were not in such a prosperity as  
most people in my surroundings.

When they told me that I had been admitted to the faculty of  
medicine.

Once in my homes yard, I was plaing football with my cousin and  
in a certain quick the ball went on uncontrolled putting down a  
bird-cage, killing it.

When I walk through streets late at night. This is because I and  
my friends were attacked one night without any reason for it.

I felt disgusted on seeing my boyfriend after our separation.   
One day he was begging at the mass transit railway station and at  
that moment I hated him.

I feel shame when sometimes, (unconsciously) I behave unethically  
and without understanding the problems of the man I love.

When I did not do well in the PG310 test I, I got only 4 marks  
above the pass marks despite my effort.  I felt bad because quite  
a number of friends did better.

My brother wanted me to buy a flute with him but I didn't accept  
afterwards I regretted it because he became sad.

When I first saw the state of a cafeteria in the grounds of the  
university. Due to students own lack of concern for the  
environment in which they eat and drink. Rubbish and spilled tea  
and coffee left everywhere.

At one of my close friends saying she didn't like the way I am  
nice to people I don't know, or who have been nasty to me.
I felt joy when my two twin sisters were born.
When I copy someone else's problem set.
I shot the decisive goal in an ice-hockey match.

When I heard that I had passed my final examination at school  
(with success).

I felt guilty when I learnt that some of friends found the  
finished at the Cafeteria because I took food which was more than  
my share.

I felt guilty when I heard the results of my friend, who had  
failed.  I wished that I had helped him.

The time when I cleaned the house and everything was tidy,  
then my cousin, who is 4 years old, came with a muddy pot and made  
a mess of the whole thing.

When a girl did not answer a question, concerning my love for  
her, put forward to her.

When I was going home for my holiday, I almost drowned in the  
Zambezi river.

I had joined a youth group that observed the affairs of our  
community and so I had many opportunities to contact the  
government and the committee members of the district board (a  
local executive structure).  We always tried to consult and  
discuss with them, but we found that such people did not  
understand community affairs and they even dampened our  
enthusiasm in local affairs.  I did not understand why they had  
decided to work as community leaders.
When I met my new girlfriend with another man in the street.
When I had a little accident with my boss'car.

Because I am the Captain of a basketball team I usually organise  
a roster system so that everyone in the team can have a turn at  
doing either a duty or a ref. A lot of the time the girls can't  
be bothered or just forget - I usually have to fill in.
When I get a hug from someone I love.

I got a letter from my best friend, whom I had not heard from for  
a long time (a good letter).

On one occasion whilst engaging in horseplay with my girlfriend,  
I caused her to be physically harmed.
China winning the Asian Olympic games (TV).
Not being able to do well to be chosen for the English lecture.

When a close friend failed to live up to the expectations I had  
of him - thereby causing pain to his spouse. I believe that my  
anger was probably a reaction of fear that I wouldn't be able to  
live up to my own expectations.
When I don't succeed to fulfill a promise.

Going away for the weekend, leaving my College room open - when I  
returned several friends had had a party there, leaving the mess.

When I learned that several people had died in the street due to   
the cold weather.
I had a dream in which I was an African elephant.

I was so sick that my relatives thought that I was bewitched.  I  
felt like dying.

When I was face to face with my deceived friend after sleeping  
with his wife.
With an alcoholic.

My girlfriend left the house in which we lived together a few  
months ago. This made me very sad.
Not helping other people to do their homework.
When I failed to answer a simple question.

A very good friend of mine had been away for three months. When  
we met again, we ran up to each other and embraced.

When I gave birth to a child and saw that it was normal when it  
was put against my breast.

A female friend was violently ill on the return journey from a  
wedding reception we attended. Getting her out of the car when  
home took quite a while.

I was caught doing something bad and I bribed the person who  
caught me.  Later I felt very bad, maybe I should have paid for  
my bad behaviour.

One of my friends kept criticizing me about everything I did. I  
thought she was kidding, but later I found out that she was  
serious.
When I was mistreated by my step-mother.

Winning a close volleyball game. (I'm on the intercollegiate team  
at CAL)

When I heard that my father had passed away. I could not eat for  
a week and was only crying. I could not find the courage to go to  
bath.

When I decided my first marriage had ended, and left with the  
child. I felt overwhelmed by guilt as I was separating mother and  
child.

When I saw the list of books to read for an acccouting course, I  
thought " Oh God how will I ever manaage it!"

It was in 1983 September when MCE results were being announced on  
the radio. When I heard my name that I had done well I just kept  
quiet. I was so happy that I couldn't even talk.
When I knew about my first job.
Lecturers being unfair to me in reports.

I forgot that the course instructor had directed us to go for  
special classes after the usual class hours.  I missed this the  
first day and when he asked me about it the next day I said that  
I had forgotten.
Spots on the seat covers of my husband's car.

When a close friend entrusted me with a secret and I let the cat  
out of the bag.
At age 10 my foster grandmother died, I had a fear of dying.

At the tender age of eleven a friend and I left a party and  
proceeded to walk through dark and secluded streets of a bad  
neighborhood to find a telephone (recent spate of Horror Movie  
watching had occurred).

After I had lived with my boyfriend in a foreign country for half  
a year, I saw that it was impossible for me to stay with him (for  
economic reasons). We separated although I loved him.

I had received bad news informing me that grandmother and  
grandfather had passed away. The first one to die was my  
grandmother and after two days grandfather died too.

I learnt from the newspaper that I had been accepted at the  
Chinese university of H.K.  It was 7 o'clock in the morning.   
Later I told my family and relatives about it and had tea with  
them very joyfully.

This is a kind of confession - my mum found me stealing meat from  
the pot.

When I knew that my niece did a bad schoolar examination because  
I couldn't explain her the lesson.

During a movie in which I saw the effect of white settlers in  
Africa.

When summer is over and I have to leave the town where I spend my  
holidays.

My cat was sick and I had to take him to the vet to be put down -  
no one else there to do it.

When I was accused of having refused to do some hostel work while  
I was at school.  Actually I had not been allocated any work.
Not to have studied enough when exams were near.
The time I qualified to enter secondary school.

It was a narrow and dirty passage which was located near the  
market and I had to stand there to wait for people.

When biking and I felt very bad (problems with heart and  
respiration).
When I failed an exam unfairly.

I was afraid when my dog ran out through a crack in the fence  
when  a train was coming.
A dear friend was removed from the division whre I work.
Talking about someone behind their back.
When I was a school girl and I copied at a class work.
I was misbehaving in the agency.
Being criticized by teacher in public.

Someone told me he was chosen for the English lectures because he  
was a good friend of the class leader.
When one of my cat died of a disease.

I felt very sad when I lost my three Kwacha at civo Stadium when  
Sam Mangwana was playing some Rumba records. That was not what I  
expected, I wanted some Disco records.

In 1972 I failed my Examination because of my own crooky  
behaviour of dodging from Examinations.

In a tram, the ticket seller was commanding, taking the role of a  
leader, trying to emphasize her non-existent authority with undue  
strictness towards a good-humoured drunk who could not find his  
ticket at once.
When, after a long time of searching I got my first job.

One of my friends asked me to go shopping with her, another  
friend of hers was also coming along.  During the outing they  
kept talking to each other and I felt left out, even when I tried  
to talk to them they seemed not to listen to me and did not pay  
me much attention.
My old teacher in primary school died.

After my girl and I talked things over our relationship changed  
and became positive.  A diificult time turned into pleasant one.

I was present when they found a shop-keeper dead in his shop.   
He had been shot with a shotgun at close range.
I felt it at the same time when I felt disgust.

When we were playing, I hurt my little sister, but towards my  
mother I did not admit that it was my fault.

I had a friend who was very kind to me.  I tried my best to like  
him and understand him but when I was with him I could not help  
rejecting, criticizing and blaming him.  I wanted to get away  
from him as soon as possible.

I insulted a couple of good friends of mine and even tried to hit  
them when I was drunk.  The next day, I was ashamed of course.
When a group of friends began to make critics about me.

When I was in the army, a room mate of mine came back from  
furlough and threatened another fellow with a knife.
Someone vomited on the street.
When I was admitted to a certain school as a student.

I couldn't sleep, and began to remind of my childhood. We are many  
sisters and at that time we were spanked a lot and I don't know  
why I started to remind of the spanks they and I had had, their  
shouts when this happened.

At the funeral of a friend about 20 years old, who was killed in  
a hit-and-run motorcycle accident.

When I heard that my Uncle had passed away in a road traffic  
accident.
Not noticing my roommates quietness or a sign of discomfort.
Shouting at my parents because I was angry about something else.

When my grandfather died, I saw my grandmother crying against my  
aunt's shoulder (I had never seen my grandmother cry before).

When I finally managed to get a specific sound from my guitar,  
after baving tried for a long time.

One day I felt dizzy during a lecture.  When the lecturer asked  
us as to who had heard the fairy tale - I was the only one who  
put up his hand and this surprised the whole class.

Discussing with a certain person about a job I was getting and  
that perosn was negative and pessimistic.
Made a misjudgement in a football match.

Having finally to admit I was wrong, after having denied it for a  
long time.
When I was selected to come here.
When I answered to my mother with rudeness.

My older brother who gives me unwanted advices about problems in  
my relationship with my girlfriend.
Hearing my girlfriend accept my offer of marriage.

We were on the road in a car when a lorry bypassed us.  We had to  
swerve and we almost got run over.
I did not reply to my friend's letter in time.

In our flat the bath-tub is in the kitchen. At the beginning I  
had very intensive feelings of shame when I had a bath and people  
were in the kitchen.
When I learnt that I had been accepted at the medical school.

When some housemen told me a young girl like you should not be  
allowed to lecture to consultants, I was too shy to argue against  
them.
After the fact that made me ashamed I felt sadness.

A series about Freud was shown on TV.  In it, a tampon had been  
set in the nose of a woman, and forgotten there.  After great  
pain it was taken off (close-up picture), the woman was bleeding  
from the nose and the mouth.
Before giving a seminar to a rather large audience.
Finding out I was chosen for the English lectures.

When before the last exam I have taken, I went out instead of  
studying.
One of my best friends was hurt by a girl he loves.
China winning the Asian Olympic games.
When I was told that my uncle had passed away.

I felt sad after having had an argument with my boyfriend.  I felt  
that he did not understand me and that there was no point in  
carrying on with the relationship.

I received the results of the test paper of my major subject and  
I found that my result was not as good as a classmate who had  
recently changed his major subject.    I felt very ashamed.
Once I did not have enough money to pay for a coffee.

I was badly beaten up by one of my friends during a wedding  
party.
When my first love was not successful.

Some people were unfairly treated, because of their  
nationality/colour.
Being rude to somebody who was impolite to me.

Being subject to unfair treatment in a working group, someone  
"bending the rules" was protected by the boss. This resulted in  
more work for the others.

When I lost the notes of the lecturer I had borrowed from my  
friend.

Joining in a research group studying consumer's behaviour and  
helping the people in the shop with the sales.
Renewed contact with an earlier friend.
When I demand too much from my friends.

After some friends had come to see me. They had stayed for  
several days and we had got on very well. When they had left, I  
had a feeling of emptyness.

When my father passed away of cancer, I was extremely saddened.  
He was not very old, which made matters worse. The actual death  
was horrendous, but the moving funeral saddened me more so.
To fight with a sister and to know that she doesn't care.
Passing away of my father.

I hated you for not letting me go and found out that it was not  
your decision.
Being caught in changing the truth (lying).

I was ashamed when my boyfriend went to sit with another girl  
when he invited me to come to watch Drama festival.
Death of a parent.

My son lives in the country. I feel sadness when I see mothers  
having walks with their children.
When my first child was born.

In the morning, the cat of my landlady had vomited on the floor,  
near the staircase I take to go to the bathroom.

I had planned a trip to the South during Easter, together with a  
friend. She was very sorry when I changed my mind and decided not  
to go after all.
Nothing.

My elder brother had been expelled from college and he was so  
frustated that he attempted suicide - he drank bottle fragments.   
I was very sad when I learnt this.

For my parents anniversary, we hosted a party and we were very  
happy.

I was angry about 3 months ago and I kicked backwards against the  
wall. It caved in and so I had to show it to my parents. I had  
been angry after my mother said something to me about not being  
able to find clothes in my size - something that I'm sensitive  
about. (6' 5'' 210)
A friend breaking up with her boyfriend.

I was in form five at the boarding school and my friends and I  
had gone drinknig beer in the nearby village.  And we were caught  
red handed there by a form master.

I was very happy when my scholarship to continue studying at UNZA  
was approved after it had been cancelled.

I once saw an elderly lady who was not properly dressed.  She was  
wearing a transparent dress, such things are not sopposed to be  
seen in African society.

When I was working as a nurse in a mental hospital, a patient ate  
up the contents of another patient's spitoon.

The funeral of a friend who was killed in a car accident. She was  
of my own age, there were many of my own friends present, as well  
as her family etc.

I heard a broadcasting programme about parapsychology. The people  
in this programme used very difficult words which I couldn't  
understand. They acted exaggerated without showing any feeling.

When I started a relation with a girl, with whom I have fallen in  
love already some time ago.

When my sister left to go home, in Sweden, after the Christmas  
Holidays.

I stayed for several weeks with a friend of mine before she moved  
to live with her husband. One evening he came drunk and made an  
awful scene, which I still remember.

I was really shameful when my mother beat me in the presence of  
my friends because I didn't cook lunch up until 2 o'clock.

It was a week before the higher level results were announced.  I  
had tried and failed many times and this was the last time that  
I was taking the exam.  I knew that if i failed again I woulld  
have to enter the society.  I imagined things during this period  
- I dreamt that I had entered university and it was a nice  
experience.  When I thought about the future, an unexplainable  
fear rose in me.  I feared being a worker and not having a bright  
prospect, I also feared the criticism of my relatives as my  
brother had gone to university.  Whenevr I thought of this issue  
I could not eat or concentrate, and my heart beat increased.

My friend replying to my letter and again saying he was attracted  
to me and suggesting we write, talk and get together and see how  
things went and his suggestion that I could ring and doing that it  
was really good - though really insane conversation.

I put an end to a friendship with a girl - I had only pretended  
love and affection to be able to sleep with her.

A friend of mine uses butter instead of oil when he is cooking. I  
am always angry about that, because it is an unnecessary luxury.  
Recently we both were cooking and he wanted to use butter again.  
When I had already put the oil into the pan, he poured it out  
again and put the butter into the pan.

I insulted two of my friends because I thought that had been  
gossiping about me right under my nose, however I later found out  
that they were not doing so.

First time I slept with my present girlfriend. Had been best  
friends for a year but had been hesitant about getting involved  
emotionally.

When reading a newspaper story of a man who had committed  
incestuous acts on his two-year old child - the thought that  
anyone could do such a thing is abhorrent to me.

When my friend, as usual, forgot the tickets at home for a  
performance.  We missed it.

When last year in college I received the award "Best Student of the Year",  
  I felt very happy as I got what I had wanted and my wish had  
been fulfilled.
Having a car accident.

The day before the university results came out I was both excited  
and scared.  If I failed I did not know what I would do as I did  
not want to work, my family was ambivalent.

When my husband and I spent a night by ourselves in a house which  
was in an area on the outskirts of a large town with which we were   
not familiar.  We  heard strange noises outside the house and the   
house had glass walls so the whole thing was even more  
frightening.

I felt something close to that when I saw that there was a man on  
the terrace of the flat.

I quarrelled with my younger sister because I had said something  
against her boyfriend.  Consequently she looked through me when  
she saw me as she thought that I was trying to separate them.   
She had misunderstood me.

The first time that I saw a surgeon cut off a leg and put it in a  
black rubbish bag.

When a certain drunk man slapped my buttocks when I was quietly  
standing waiting for a bus.
When my brother gave me a watch.

In 1977, my grandfather, to whom I had a very close relationship,  
died.

I do not seem to feel emotion such as shame, guilt or fear - far  
out !
Movement in bush late at night while camping.
When they threatened me with a knife to take my money.
When I was reproved eighth grade of high school.

The behaviour of a colleague of mine, which doesn't correspond to  
my norms of behaviour.

My husband suddenly fell ill seriously and during the medical  
examinations we did not know what would follow.

When a close friend, residing in the hostel, lost his father I  
really pittied him and the situation made me feel sad.

Some time ago I was disgusted with the "cleanness" of the  
refectory of our institute.
Not being able to help my friend to study English.

I had promised to contact a friend about a particular matter by a  
certain date, then thought no more about it until the friend  
reminded me after the date had passed.

In a day when at work, in school, and relationships came out as I  
wanted, and I was recognized in my work.

A friend of mine suggested that I become a film extra.  The idea  
seemed very funny to me and my reaction seemed rather outlandish  
to the others.
Finding out that my best friend could not go to university.

An old woman was violently thrown down the stairs of the tube by  
a group of louts.

The day I got to know that I would get a shared dwelling with my  
boyfriend.  My parents place was getting a little crowded with  
my growing bother wanting a room to himself.  I first felt doubt,  
then joy, but also sadness.  The feeling of joy was the  
strongest.
I did not deliver a message on time.

It happened that my brother promised to give me money for school  
and then he told me that he had failed to fulfil his promise a  
day before school started. I became so angry for I thought my  
future would be ruined.

I had to decline an appointment which had been very important for  
the other person. For this reason we even got into trouble.
Got in touch with earlier friends after a long absence.

I had this feeling when my parents distroyed a relationship with  
a boy because they thought he was bad and irresponsible.

I feel disgusted when people do not understand me in the right  
way, i.e they misunderstand me.

One day I was supposed to go to a movie with my boyfriend. In the  
morning I went to see my Auntie and I didn't come back up to  
evening.

Some boys talking about nicknames of the lecturers, and I was too  
afraid of them to stop them.

I had a very good friend in secondary school.  The year after our  
graduation I prepared to celebrate her birthday and I called off  
all my appointments.  I got together the other friends and we  
were ready to give the entire day to her.  However this friend  
disappeared on her birthday.  When I phoned another friend I  
didcovered thay she was busy, I did not call her anymore.

At noon one Sunday I received a phone call telling me that my  
mother had been knocked down by a car at the street crossing and  
that her husband should go and see her.  I could not believe this  
as my father and my mother had gone out together to buy lunch  
boxes.  However I immediately ran to the scene of the accident.

When I am in an environment or with a person much worse off than  
me, I realize how privileged I am.

When I gave water to the plants of a friend. Then one plant fell  
over, and a little statue broke. I, of course, had to tell him  
everything.

A friend catched me while masturbating. I am not fully sure  
whether she saw it or not.
When I happen to witness some sadistic acts.

Felt it after I spoke terribly (got mad at) the person who is the  
most important in my life.

When my nephew asked me to tell him a story and I simply did not  
have the energy or the will.  When I saw his disappointment I was  
terribly guilty and read a story to him after all.

During a demonstration I climbed up the closed central door of a  
bus.  When the bus stopped I had to go back to the same place,  
afraid that the police would see me.

My father accused my brother of having bumped his car, and it was  
wrong.

I had written a "love-letter" to a class-mate of mine, this was  
meant to be a joke.  Unfortunately it fell in the wrong hands   
and I had to face the consequences.
Disgust with drunk people.
Criticized by a teacher in public.

When my best friend started getting involved in my private  
affairs.

I was angry when my friends said that I should not receive  
Nursing Science books because there was a rumour that I was  
intending to leave the college.

Once our school class went skiing. On a steep slope a boy  
standing behind me lost his balance, fell down and drew me with  
him. I slided down the whole slope. At about 1 m distance from a  
tree I could stop.

Getting drunk and creating a lot of trouble at a place I respect  
- my friend's home.

This feeling I sensed quite recently. It was arisen by the  
terrific thought that I might lose the man I loved !
When I was walking around all alone at night.
When India first won the world cup cricket tournament.

When I finished a relation after four years, leading to much  
sorrow for the other one and myself ("although it was the best  
solution").
When I saw a dog which had been knocked down by a car.

I went to see a friend. There were other people, too, and  
everybody brought some present. I was the onlyone who brought  
nothing. My friend was very hospitable and did not show anything  
- although I knew how he felt.

My feelings towards would-be in-laws for their participation in  
recent broken relationship.
Article published.

During my Summer vacations I planned a carnival for the community  
youth center with a few other volunteers.  I was the head of the  
organizors and we spent over a month planning it.  During this  
period we got to know and understood each other.  We  
discovered each others potential and we planned many interesting  
things for the carnival.  The day of the carnival everything was  
bright, the programmes went well and the attendants enjoyed it.   
I felt extremely excited about it.

Arguing with a friend over politics. She was more informed on the  
issues and made me feel very ashamed of my political ignorance.

The fear about my future : work, making ends meet and health.  
Coping.

On a boat trip to Denmark, 14 of us had a lot of fun and we  
spent SEK 10 each on one armed bandits and against all odds we  
won the jackpot of SEK 1000.
Watching a TV documentary on seal clubbing.

When my friend and I were discussing the good looks of a guy we  
realized that he had been listening.

When after a storm in the country, I left my shelter and saw a  
big, fat, slimy green toad by my side.

It was August 30th when I heard on the radio that I passed my  
M.C.E. exams and I was really happy and joyous because of the  
event.

My best frieend left school recently.  The next day the weather  
turned bad suddenly and the male class-mates turned off the  
lights.  I remained on the table and was scared.

When I had not been accepted to a college which I dreamed of  
going to. I felt that I had let myself and my parents down.

After yelling at my girlfriend, I felt bad because she was ?  
crying and upset.
When I met a friend that I hadn't seen for some time.

Viewing the results of senseless vandalism to a local primary  
school.

One day, I was home and there was a phone call informing me that  
some of my relatives had died in an accident.
When my father died.

It was in a tramway-carriage: A stranger insulted a girl just  
because she blew her nose. I detested his behaviour.

The day the results of the university entrance exam was  
published, I found my canditate number and I was very excited.

I was in a car accident on the way back from a weekend rowing  
regatta we'd won. 5 others were in the car. I thought I'd never  
be able to row again.

I feel this feeling most often before me not before the others.  
My outside is iron but actually I'm wasting away.

Too busy to write letters to friends and they said I had  
forgotten about them.
Winning Queensland Chess Championship.

When I was ringing up a guy who was my teen idol, and was in  
Auckland. I was really scared, I didn't know what to say or do.

I felt sadness when I notice that I'm not important for a  
determinate person. We do many things for a friend, and we see  
soon after, that he doesn't do anything for us, nor thinks of us.

I once felt guilty when a certain passenger in the same (ship,  
plane ?) which I boarded when coming from home lost his 10t which  
in fact fell into my pocket unknowingly.
My companion admired me when I did some work voluntarily.

When I was a kid, I always opened the door to greet my father  
when he came back from work.  One day it so happened that his  
hair was scattered due to over-crowding in the train, and when I  
opened the door as usual I saw something else.  I was so scared  
that I could not talk.

I was dishonest to my boyfriend concerning something that is  
important to our relationship.
I felt disgust of dirty.
When I saw a ghost.

When a car is overtaking another and I am forced to drive off the  
road.

When I was looking for a job I felt a lot of fear but the fear  
was greater when I found it.

My parents put pressure on me to buy clothes, when I would not  
have liked to do so.

A close friend first said he accepted an agreement, but later  
used that agreement as a reason for attacking me.

Sincerely I'm a very timid guy and so even in very simple  
situations sometimes I am ashamed.

My fiancT's family was adopting a 5 years old boy. I felt
