didn't get to Mum and Dad until I was 6 and then legally adopted  
at 14.

A friend of mine told me that my boyfriend had been with another  
girl this Summer.  We had been going out together for four years  
and we had not done so for the last three months.  I could not  
believe it.

I was angry with a person who behaved terribly at a ball  
offending her relatives.

In adolescence I had a very violent fight with my sister I hold  
her stong in her neck, she had a throat surgery what make me feel  
guilty about the future reactions she might had injuring the  
surgery.

I came across a group of people with the same basic ideas/beliefs  
who were all fighting and going against what they would say was  
good.

When I scored the third goal to my own side at a football match  
against William Murray Secondary School and we were badly  
defeated.
When one has been unjust, stupid towards someone else.

Some weeks ago I experienced a day that everything went wrong I  
broke several things I felt very ashamed for I am not a sloven.
When I have been overhastingly offending or hurting.
When my dog died.

After the interview for admission to the university and before  
the admission list was disclosed.  I was scared that I would not  
be admitted and my fear lasted for quite some time.  My fear  
disappeared only after the list was disclosed.

Unfair and unjust attitude toward a person close to me, what I  
was the witness of, caused anger in me.

I feared that I would not be able to hand in the book-report on  
time as I had started working very late.  The book was difficult  
to read and my teacher did not accept my work as it was handed in  
late.

An ex-colleague asked me if I was interested in working in their  
accounts bureau.  They needed "clever people" and he had  
"immediately thought of me."

I didn't like my former fob and felt joy when I received a  
telegram offering me a new one that I though better and for which  
I had been waiting.

A few weeks back I had a very important seminar and I had  
circulated my papers to all the panel members.  A day before the  
seminar I realized that I had inadvertantly burdened certain        
derivations and I had failed to correct it.  I feared that this     
would reflect very badly on my performance.  Fortunately none of   
the panel members detected it and I felt relieved.

A friend of mine gave birth to a child. Very dangerous delivery.  
I was afraid for her and for the baby.

Listening to the opening bars of Tchaikovsdy's symphony No.2  
fourth movement at my sister's wedding.

I was ashamed of the way I deceived that I could not help a  
friend, although it was absolutely possible for me. Nothing was  
revealed but I haven't called up this person since then.

A friend of mine often had difficulties with her parents. Once  
she had a child she had a better relationship with them.

My parents appreciate very much me and my boyfriend coming and  
have dinner with them at Christmas. However we decided to visit  
his parents. My mother was rather disappointed.

Realizing one's desire, an experienced feeling of satisfaction  
from the realization of one's desires and aims.

When my niece was 3 years old she was in the living room while we  
were fixing the table for a birthday party and, as every child,  
she couldn't stay calm. She burst a balloon. When I told her to  
be quiet her father pinched her. I believe if I hadn't said anything  
this wouldn't have happened.

Once I was not able to give a relative, who was in a critical  
period, a helping hand.  Whenever I think about it I feel guilty   
for letting down the person who trusted me to give him a helping  
hand.

A neighbour's girl had disappeared and many people were looking  
for her.  Someone had gone to notify the police.  Something had  
certainly happened to her.

Two summers ago my best friend and I drove into unknown mountains  
at midnight to pick up my broken car. We told one another  
horrifically scary ghost/murder stories and succeeded in scaring  
eachother pretty well - even though somewhere in our heads we  
knew the fears were unjustified.

One day mother slaughtered a chicken for a brother who had come  
back for holiday. In everybody's absence I opened the foodstore  
and ate all internal organs of the chicken. When mother  
discovered, we were all called and I was found with hands stained  
with soup. I was ashamed being the eldest of all in the family.

When being illoyal (disloyal) to people close to me. Had such an  
episode with my sister, who should have received my support and  
attention.

My friend often played a joke on me and sometimes I thought that  
he was a nonsensical person. Once when we went to a friend's  
house he walked in first and shut the door firmly behind him.  I  
felt that he did not respect me and moreover I was his friend so  
he should not have behaved like that.  I was very angry (as it is  
I was in a bad mood then).

When I told off a computer teacher who did not want to teach me  
beacause of prejudice.

When my friend failed an exam by just one mark.  During this exam  
she had asked me to show her my answer sheet and I had not done  
it.  When the results came out, I thought that had I shown her my  
answer sheet she would have passed the exam.  I felt guilty as I  
had failed her.

When a good friend with whom I had an intimate relationship made  
clear that he didn't want to continue in the same way. He choose  
his girlfriend (also a friend of mine).

No specific instances - perhaps having lied as a child resulting  
in someone else being blamed for the event.

As the only person in my family into academics, I ought to have  
looked after my younger (and only) sister better, with respect to  
her education and life experiences.

I often feel guilty, and it has to do with other people, e.g. if  
I haven't visited my older relatives for a while.

When my grandfathers died and I realized how much I would miss  
them.
Not doing something I had promised.

I turned the knob of my granny's two band radio and did not hear  
any broadcast,  " What ! Have I broken the knob ? How much does  
it cost ? What if the spare part is not available ? "  --I did  
not know how to tune a radio.

When the university withdrew the accomodation that it had given  
me.
Overhear people talking about me and saying that I am stupid.

Quite unconsciously I offended a girlfriend of mine. It was  
really worthy to pass this fact over in silence, but I acted so,  
because I believed I was right. In fact it often happens to me to  
feel guilt, after I have already done the deed.
When a friend of mine visited me and my house was in a mess.

I didn't tell my parents that I was going to Sofia. I told them  
that I was going to a seminar. My mother knew that I was lying but  
she didn't stop me.

Sleeping with a girl on a Saturday night and then not contacting  
her in later days.

At end of school - function to "celebrate" ? Leaving friends who  
I'd known for up to 12 years.
Winning the local soccer championships this year was a great joy.

In my opinion guilt is a feeling which goes together with shame.  
Here then I refer to the situation of guilt.

A girl dropped some stuff from her bag and when I tried to help  
her I realized that she had used me and I was made to look like a  
fool.

I got into a bad fight in a bar and my friend received a bad cut  
above his left eye while trying to separate us.
Close relative is dying of cancer - found out last week.
When I found that my coldness had hurt somebody's sincerity.

Walking through campus at night a squirrel jumped in front of  
me.
Spit and vomit.
Once when I crossed the street, and was nearly trampled by a car.

I was walking home one night (after getting a bus to my town)  
when I was confronted by a group of males (about 6), they would  
not let me pass - they made comments etc. - I crossed the road  
and hurried home.

A man kept a seat taken by putting his coat on it after a while  
the chair was still empty, I asked him if I could use the chair,  
he didn't agree for the chair was for his coat.

Once late at night (around midnight) a person asked me to give  
him a lift. He suddenly tried to attack me but I could escape.  
After this he followed me for a little while.
Lack of respect for my parents.
I was called and invited to have a talk about a job I wanted to have.

When I was at school, no one thought I could pass my MCE so at  
the end of the year my name was announced on the radio that I had  
passed. I was the happiest person.

A serious drug error while nursing that I knew I was responsible  
for (patient lived, no complications fortunately).

It made me very sad to hear that some construction company was  
going to build houses on the beautiful hills by my house.

I have a girlfriend, who is almost like a daughter to me.  She is  
studying out of station and I get to see her only once a year.   
Her arrival is always a joyous one.
Watching a horror film.

When my grandfather was in a nursing home when I was young I never  
wanted to go and sometimes didn't have to and later I felt  
guilty.

When my father found me in bed with a girl, we were deep in actioon  
when he entered the room.

The death of Jaya Prakash Narayan caused a great deal of sadness  
as I believed that he was the only true democrat and a ray of  
hope on the Indian horizon.
The same for guilt would apply.
When I heard that I had been selected for the university.

Disagreements with mother.  When I moved from KankaanpSS, she had  
promised to help me move but broke her promise because of some  
hindrance.
I missed the last tram home and had to walk in the pouring rain.

When I was in a car with my parents and friends and we had to  
back up (reverse) pass a river which when I recall it (I was only  
about 5 yrs) seemed we were going to fall in and drown.

A certain colleague of mine sent me to buy a bag of flour for him,  
he gave me K20. Unfortunately I lost it.

Students fear many things but we seem to fear the examinations  
most of all. I remember I was horror stricken before my  
microbiology exam, because it was a decisive one.
[ Depressions.]

Hearing about a friend back home that had to have his stomach  
pumped because he had overdosed on pills.

When I almost drowned myself in the municipal swimming pool that  
I use to go almost not excaping.

Once a week I work as a volunteer in a biologic garden. this work  
in the garden and the contact with other volunteers filled me  
with joy. They also gave me support after I failed passing my  
driver's test.

When I passed the first year and so I could come back for my  
second year.

While having an argument with my daughter, I got angry and  
over-excited and said angry words.

When I cheated my trusting girlfriend by telling her that I was a  
qualified doctor and later she found out that I was only a  
medical student at the preclinical level.

When I had broken a piece of glass of the refrigerator by putting  
a hot pan in it.
When I got to know the details if the famine in East Africa.
Walking out from the biology building.

On own reading book. Recall came to mind of slight sexual  
exploitation of a female (years ago) i.e. had her on even for  
sexual motives.
When mother was very ill, I feared that she would die.

I told a lie about someone to someone else and they found out    
and questioned me about it.

Losing close people and animals. So far, I've felt most when  
losing our dog in a traffic accident.

When we had swimming instruction, we had to take a header from  
the springboard. I usually refused to do that, but at least I was  
forced to.

Fear of punishment for having broken an item of value to my  
parents.

I experienced it when I was accepted at the Medical Higher  
Institute.
Before I had a tooth pulled out.  I was very upset and ill.

I was driving very fast on a small road and I met an oncoming car  
in a right handed bend.  The other driver was on his own side of  
the road and I had to skid out of it to avoid a collision.  It  
was dark.
Broken a friend's cup.
When my children were born.

When I had to lie about my age to be accepted as a member of a  
group.

I felt very sad when I left home because I could not stand it any  
longer. I do not regret it, but I missed my little sister very  
much (and she missed me). These feelings wear off over time.
Having been angry and unpleasant towards my parents.

The hero was chased by a terrible vampire in a suspense and  
horror film shown on T.V.
When my father was involved in an accident.
[ I feel sad when somebody is unjust to me.]

My girlfriend started singing (she cannot sing) and did not stop  
despite my asking her to do so.

A situation where I ignored my beliefs and principles for a trip  
of whimsy.

I had to unscrew something on my car. I didn't succeed after two  
afternoons of trying. A feeling of anger built up itself.

I worked together with another student on a computer-assignment.  
She didn't do her best and didn't prepare herself for it. She  
expected me to explain it to her.
Walking in the dark I saw something strange.

In the underground's escalator, a youngish bum asked me for  
money.  Although I did not give him anything, the fellow told me  
that I was really good-looking.  A man who was in front of me  
also turned to look at me.

Before an accident, my aunt offered me the front seat of the car,  
next to the driver. I declined, she took that seat and was killed  
there when the car crashed.

When I read about Reagan's tactical decision concerning the  
South African boycott.
When I knew I had to go out with my mother on some errands.
When I understood that I was admitted to the University.

Someone told me a story of Amnesty International: a boy was  
killed and his head was put in the litter of his girlfriend. It  
looked as if she was pregnant, then she died. It is disgusting, I  
can hardly write it down.

After being told that an ex-boyfriend had been hurt by my wearing  
something he had given me when I was with another guy. I was  
unaware of my actions really, as I had not considered the fact  
that he had given it to me, and might see me. I still respected  
his opinions of me.

I caught a huge eel on a fishing line which I had pulled into the  
boat. I cut the line and threw the whole lot back into the water.  
Later that day and about ten miles away I went swimming and  
someone made the comment wondering how far eels could swim, I  
abruptly ended swimming for fear at an unseen eel for a few days  
until we had left the district.
I was going away, leaving a dear person behind.
[ After an examine I had been satisfied with.]
Whenever I think of enrolling in Organic Chemistry.

When the Real Madrid team of basket ball qualified for the final  
of the Europe Cup at Athens.

Finding out in your lecture that a doctor can make misdiagnoses  
because of ignorance in neuropsychology.

When I complained to my mother about how untidy the kitchen  
loooked, she boxed my ears ( this had never happened before).

I feel disgust towards those who are responsible for the death of  
others.

A few days after I had finished the relationship with my  
boyfriend, we had a quarrel. Then he hit me. At that moment I  
found him disgusting.

When I realized that I was pregnant.  I thought about what my  
relatives and friends would think about me and I felt a lot of  
self pity.

I was sleeping nicely until in the middle of the night when I became  
awake because a friend called me for some (in my opinion)  
nonsens reason.

When a friend of mine died in a hiking accident.  I was not  
present there and only got the news later.
When I failed an exam I thought I could pass easily.

I was jogging in the forest, in the central park area, when I saw  
a man hiding behind a tree.  I got frigthened, turned around and  
ran out of the forest.

Once I offended a friend, instead of her coming to me to ask and  
discuss the matter she was just telling other people about it and  
say all she could about me.

One night we were having a barbecue on the beach and I needed to  
go to my car, which was far away from the beach.  It was very  
dark as there were no street lamps.  I ran in the dark, very  
scared, I ran as fast as possible.

I felt guilty at not having practised the piano.  I waste my  
teacher's time and guidance.

In the tram there was a fat, sickly looking woman in front of me  
who was asking for directions in a thick voice.  When she got up to  
go a disgusting smell of urine came from her.  I felt that I  
would choke.

When I was talking to a person who is a hypocrite, I felt  
disgusted at his reaction.
Heated discussion with spouse concerning new house.

Some time ago I promised to meet an acquaintance of mine and to  
carry him some promised papers. I haven't done it until this day.  
Now I feel quite awkward when I meet him.

About my girlfriend's sister who is a viper as I discovered some  
time ago.

The juniors in our dormitory at school started to complain and  
make a lot of noise about the duties assigned to them by the  
prefect who was my class-mate and was very cool and dull.

A friend prepared a soup with chicken heads and invited me to eat  
it. I saw the eyes staring at me and the tongues hanging out of  
the bills. I was so disgusted that I felt nausea and had to leave  
the room.

I live with my sister now and sometimes she angers me especially  
when she thinks I don't keep the apt. clean enough.
Saw a father beating up his small child.

My superior blamed me for some neglects at work in front of  
others.  In fact, the task in question was not supposed to be  
done by me.

Was picking up my father from work and on passing through the  
Valley watched three prostitutes walk up and down waiting for  
someone to pick them up. Clothing was disgusting.

My living and working conditions at home were unbearable. We used  
to live in a three room flat together with two more families. The  
discords caused a change - one of the families moved out. The  
other family stayed with us but I drifted away from my fiancT. In  
fact we were two families in the flat. Then I found myself alone  
in the struggle for this life because my fiancT did not stay next  
to me my grief and sorrow took on large proportions. I wanted to  
commit suicide but instead I threw myself against the cause of  
the irritation.

I was very angry when my friend lost my practical's journal,  
which I needed to study for the exams.

I was in Sierra Nevada, climbing a peak over 3,000 metres high,  
without any light and with many other problems.  I was afraid for  
my life.

One of my first boyfriends got mad at me because a lot of my  
close friends were guys and he didn't want me to see them anymore  
because he was jealous.

When I was a teacher in an evening school, a girl raised a lot of  
questions and expressed her opinions.  She, very often, took a  
stand which was different from mine and she thought that it  
was better than mine.  Her opinions were helpful academically, but   
she did not take into consideration my position in public.  Also  
she seemed to be very talkative and so she disgusted me.
My first public appearance in front of a rathe big audience.
Some men were talking about me and my sister.

My best friend had failed Exams. She had to leave and so we got  
separated.

A friend came to tell me that her father invited me to go on  
holiday with them in Benidorm otherwise I could not afford to go  
on holiday.
Passed an exam by 2 points.
I lost my driver's licence because of speeding.

My grades. When my parents say, "How are you doing at school,  
getting good grades ?" I say, "Great, just fine !" Actually, I  
feel ashamed about myself.
